description.short:
ok...
latest dev has new physics stuff for vehicles etc.
and here's the bones of a car, it needs some tuning.
its client-side only for now but i have a feeling you could fully simulate it all on the server and just send visuals to the client.
description.raw_message_content:
ok...
latest dev has new physics stuff for vehicles etc.
and here's the bones of a car, it needs some tuning.
its client-side only for now but i have a feeling you could fully simulate it all on the server and just send visuals to the client.

ai.description: Client-side drivable car that simulates raycast suspension, steering, and acceleration forces per wheel. Players control the vehicle body with WASD keys, while spring dampers and anti-roll bars stabilize the rigidbody. Tire hubs animate rotation and compression based on ground raycasts.
